QuestData.Title: A Desperate Defense
QuestData.Description:
The soldiers garrisoned here are doing their best to hold out, but they're struggling. Pirates haven't dared attack this gate in years, and never with such a large force.
If you're handy in a fight, Lieutenant Tarenfold will want to meet you.
He's organizing the militia up ahead.
QuestData.RewardText: Aha! Reinforcements!$B$BWait... Where are the rest of you?
